verses.roman:
ei ślokera arthe tumi hailā nirvacana
āra eka śuna bhāgavatera vacana

synonyms: ei—this; ślokera—of the verse; arthe—by the meaning; tumi—you; hailā—have become; nirvacana—speechless; āra—other; eka—one; śuna—please hear; bhāgavatera—of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; vacana—speech.
translation: The import of this verse has stopped you from arguing. Now listen to another verse of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam.
